transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I can take your family somewhere.

transport.question: I float on water! Toot toot! What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can be big or small.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at once.
🚂 I travel from city to city.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park.
🦵 You use your legs to make me go.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
🌎 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take lots of kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop at the same places every day.
🏫 I bring kids to school and back home.

transport.question: I have big wheels and help farmers on the field. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am usually green or red.

transport.question: I'm very loud and red and help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I use water to stop fires.

transport.question: I fly high with spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🏥 I can be used for rescues.

transport.question: I zoom to space! I'm very fast and tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I travel to the moon and planets.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and salty. Fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a pool.

ocean.question: I wiggle and swim and have fins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍽️ Cats and humans sometimes eat me.

ocean.question: I am a hard shell on the beach. You can hear the ocean inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be someone's home.

ocean.question: I pinch with my claws and walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have things that can grab

ocean.question: I am big and swim in the ocean. People ride on me to catch waves. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 Little fish are scared of me.

ocean.question: I'm an animal that's shaped like a star. I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I look like something in the sky.
🖐️ I have many arms, but not like yours
🌊 I live at the bottom of the sea.

ocean.question: I am a big, gray sea animal that spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I blow water out of my head.

ocean.question: I can sting you and I float in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be dangerous to touch.

ocean.question: I'm a slow, green reptile that lives in the sea and lays eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I have a shell on my back.
🥚 I love to lay eggs in the sand.
